posts.post_text: August 8, 2014 at 12:17 PM#2to create a messagebox that closes after 3 seconds:CodeStore Timer "WELCOME"Assign Timer "WELCOME" /timermode=countdown /countdowntime=0.1 /alerttype=popup /alertduration=3to trigger the messagebox:CodeGo Timer "WELCOME"
